from sortedcontainers import *
# inf = float('inf')
class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, ps: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        n = len(ps)
        ans = float('inf')
        pssumsl = SortedList([ps[i][0]+ps[i][1] for i in range(n)])
        pssubsl = SortedList([ps[i][0]-ps[i][1] for i in range(n)])
        for i in range(n):
            pssumsl.remove(ps[i][0]+ps[i][1])
            pssubsl.remove(ps[i][0]-ps[i][1])
            ans = min(ans, max(pssumsl[-1]-pssumsl[0], pssubsl[-1]-pssubsl[0]))
            pssumsl.add(ps[i][0]+ps[i][1])
            pssubsl.add(ps[i][0]-ps[i][1])
        return ans
